PARTIZAN DREŠI KESU: Crno-beli za 1.700.000 evra kupuju najskuplje pojačanje u istoriji kluba!
05 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Zile
Januarski prelazi rok nije daleko, a pred upravom Partizana je nekoliko važnih poslova i izazova.
Savo Milošević je nedavno zatražio dovođenje bar tri pojačanja, a tu su i neki poslovi koje treba završiti, a tiču se igrača koji su već u Humskoj.
Pre svega radi se o Umaru Sadiku, napadaču Rome na pozajmici u Partizanu, koji je od početnog osporavanja došao u situaciju da je postao ljubimac navijača crno-belih.
Nigerijac je najbolji strelac kluba iz Humske u dosadašnjem delu sezone i prirodno je da uprava kluba želi da ga zadrži na duže staze tako što će otkupiti njegov ugovor od „vučice“.
O tome danas pišu italijanski mediji, uz dodatak da je Partizan već u januaru spreman da plati otkupnu klauzulu u iznosu od 1.7 miliona evra.
Ukoliko se to dogodi Umar Sadik će postati najskuplji igrač u istoriji Partizana, a na toj listi za 50.000 evra pretekao bi Sejdubu Sumu. Sadik je ove sezone postigao 7 golova u Superligi i još 3 u Ligi Evrope, a zabeležio je i 7 asistencija.

PARTIZAN GETS THE BAG: Black and whites buy the most expensive boost in club history for € 1,700,000!
05 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Zile
The January deadline is not far away, and there are several important jobs and challenges ahead of the Partizan administration.
Savo Milosevic recently asked for at least three reinforcements, and there are some jobs that need to be completed that concern players already in Humska.
First of all, it is about Umar Sadik, a Roma striker on loan in Partizan, who from the initial dispute has come to the situation of becoming a favorite of black and white fans.
The Nigerian is the club's top scorer from Humska so far, and it is natural that the club management wants to keep him in the long run by buying his contract out of the draw.
The Italian media wrote about this today, adding that Partizan was already ready to pay a € 1.7 million buy-back clause as early as January.
If that happens, Umar Sadik will become the most expensive player in Partizan history, and he would beat Seydub Suma on that list for 50,000 euros. Sadik has scored 7 Super League goals and 3 more in the Europa League this season, and has recorded 7 assists.
